name: Reaper Cam
description:
Ad-free version of Reaper Cam, from the makers of Slender Cam! Insta-Grim your friends with Reaper Cam, the eerily twisted camera app that adds a little Death to your photos!

Simply take a photo or use an existing one, add an image of the Grim Reaper, edit the Grim Reaper to fit seamlessly into your picture, and share it via Facebook, Twitter, and email!

Features:
* 9 different Grim Reapers options to choose from
* Scale and Move the Grim Reaper to fit your shot
* Use the Eraser Tool to remove portions of the Grim Reaper so he seamlessly fits any scene
* Save a Color or Black and White photo
* Share to Facebook and Twitter, or email
